benchmark_details.name: Time Series and Text Explanation Generator (TTGenerator)
benchmark_details.overview: The TTGenerator is a synthesized dataset for automatically generating time series anomalies with corresponding explanations, used for fine-tuning LLMs to improve performance in time series anomaly detection tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To generate a dataset that aids in fine-tuning large language models for time series anomaly detection tasks by providing anomalies and explanations.

data.source: The dataset is synthesized using the Time Series and Text Explanation Generator (TTGenerator).
data.annotation: Automatically generated descriptions for time series anomalies.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of LLMs in detecting anomalies against the benchmark datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores on F-score and Range-F indicate better performance in identifying anomalies.
methodology.validation: Results validated against benchmark datasets for time series anomaly detection.
